ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Sal Joseph LoVecchio ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. SAL JOSEPH LOVECCHIO, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective November 1, 2017.
